tweet: (6)We need teachers now and we'll need them in the future. We're calling schools to prioritize teachers when the relief packages from government are available. Private sector in education educates around 11% of our students, we want them to be strong to support teachers&students.
tweet_search: (6)we need teachers now and we'll need them in the future. we're calling schools to prioritize teachers when the relief packages from government are available. private sector in education educates around 11% of our students, we want them to be strong to support teachers&students.

tweet: (5) We have been seeing some of the school owners putting teachers out of work by terminating teachers' contracts and obviously we have been saying that this is not something that should be happening as our all education systems rely on the back of teachers.
tweet_search: (5) we have been seeing some of the school owners putting teachers out of work by terminating teachers' contracts and obviously we have been saying that this is not something that should be happening as our all education systems rely on the back of teachers.

tweet: (4) We also know that as much as we invest in all these online platforms supplemented by TV, Radio and phones, these things are not universal as they are many kids who are not being reached. We are trying to invest more to reach as many people as possible using online learning.
